description.value:
Special: Accurate

Note: Designed to fire a variety of Specialist rounds (see Unusual Ammo). Gas Powered, minimal noise and no muzzle flash. Can be broken down into a compact pistol as a Full Action, halves range and loses Accurate. Reconstructing also requires Full Action.
